Food is great, service is great! Elias and his staff are wonderful and makes every guest feel welcome. Food is delicious and portions are generous. Don’t miss this place!

Govindas is a classical popular place in Lund. Students are often sitting almost on each other to eat here - although the best is during the warm season where one can also enjoy sitting outside.

Nice cantine where you can eat quickly, healthy and friendly. The outside area is just perfect. The smile of the cook will warm your day.
